cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB ID to an invalid hexadecimal format will cause parsing failure during configuration loading.

du.explanation_en: Setting PRACH MSG1 FDM to 10 exceeds the valid range of 0-3, causing RACH configuration failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PRACH MSG1 FDM 設定為 10 超過有效範圍 0-3，會導致 RACH 配置失敗。
